choices: One of their friends gives them the idea.

1.content: Harry and Jane start to act like the grown ups in the family over Sarah and Jim, but, how will this whole thing start?
1.title: Let Us Begin.

12.content:
It was a normal night for the family, Harry was in his room playing his computer while Jane was in hers playing with her dolls, while their parents were downstairs arguing about something

'I told you to put the garbage out' yelled Sarah

'I did it yesterday!' yelled Jim

The kids hate it when they fight, starting to be afraid they are gonna get divorced, so one night one of them makes a wish that they would be happy, who made the wish?
12.title: A wish one of them makes.

122.content: Jane made said wish, but on what?
122.title: Jane

1221.content:
Jane look up out the window, she spots a shooting star and made her wish, 'I wish mom and dad are happy, like us' she wished

the star shoots across the sky, Jane yawned and laid down in bed, as she slept the wish began to take effect

it started when.....
1221.title: A shooting star.

choices: Harry entered, Sarah in his arms.

Jane could hear someone crying, she sat up in bed and follow the sound, 'thats sounds like mommy and daddy' she said getting out of bed

the little girl followed the sound out of her bedroom, heading towards......
122111.title: Yeah.

choices: Yeah, it had become a nursery.
No, accept for the babies, it was the same.

Jane marvel at how much the room changed, there was a change table and a crib, she look inside to see the babies, being shocked as the babies are her parents, they were crying as they are naked, but wearing huge adult diapers on them

'Mommy? Daddy?' she said

Sarah and Jim look at her and.......

'this sucks' he said kicking his bed

'did they peed themselves?' he asked as Jane came back

but........

jane turn to him and.....

harry got into the car, he knows where the store is so he figure he could drive, lucky the car was built for him all of a sudden, and had two large car seats in the back

he drove the car but he then.....

13133.content:
When he gets to the room, he finds his parents crawling on the floor, having turned into 1 year olds. ''What's going on Jane?'' he asks, confused.

''I...I don't know. I wished that mom and dad would turn into babies and then...they did.'' Jane responds, feeling equally confused. Jane's wish had indeed turned their parents into babies, who were now crawling on the floor, sucking on pacifiers and wearing baby onesies with diapers underneath them.

''So what do we do now?'' Harry asks his sister. Jane tells him that the first thing they should do is get some diapers, either their old ones or go to the store to buy some. ''Why? Aren't they wearing diapers already?'' Harry responds. Jane looks at her brother and lets out a sigh. ''Well duh, and in case you aren't aware...babies pee and poop. And wanna guess where it goes when they do?'' she says rolling her eyes, not believing she even has to explain this.

She tells Harry to go look for their old diapers in the house. Does Harry find any?
13133.title: SE

choices: Wanted him to watch TV with her.
Wanted to split a snack with him.

'What are you doing young man?' she scolded

Jim folded his arms too, Harry and jane....

The kids held the bottles until they were draines. Then harry and jane left the room leaving the parents laying down like babies while their chins were soaked with milk

1422.content:
So the comet that flew by didn't just turn Sarah and Jim into babies, but it also turned Harry and Jane a couple of years older, now making them teenagers.

''Whoa, is this really happening?'' Harry says with a grin as he watches his parents, who are now just little babies crawling around on the floor and babbling. ''I guess so'' Jane says and continues ''We probably should get them some diapers before they pee all over the floor.''

Do Harry and Jane...
1422.title: No, they became teenagers

14221.content: They found their old diapers, but, who diapered who?

142211.content:
''Umm, how do I do this?'' Harry asks, unfolding the diaper and examining it. He had never changed a diaper before so he really had no clue what to do. ''Here, let me show you dummy'' Jane says. She explains Harry what to do and Harry then slides the diaper under Sarah and follows Jane's instructions, managing to fasten the tapes and Sarah is now diapered.

Jane then quickly does the same with Jim, clearly having previous experience and knowledge. Next they...

They dress the babies in them and also give them pacifiers. ''There we go, such cuties we have here'' Jane grins.

Next...
14221111.title: Yeah.

Harry does as he's told and soon returns with a box full of rattles, plushies, toy blocks, dolls and all different types of toys. He pours them across the floor and everything's set. ''How about we start with these'' she says and begins to play with blocks with Jim. Harry does the same with Sarah until...

info.brief_description: Harry and Jane decided to be the parents to their father and mother
info.description:
Decided how the kids become in charge, diapered the parents Sarah and Jim or anything goes

Chacters
Harry: 10 years old and a trouble maker
Jane: a good child, 8 years old and tried to be the smart one
Sarah: stricter mother and a smart woman
Jim: calm and caring father but also strict at times
info.pretty_title: How to be the Grown Up
